short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualising and Plotting sensor data from serial ports like Arduino IDE.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Support:

- Dynamically change baudrate
- Auto reconnect
- Save as .csv file
- Send string via Serial Port

Accepted Data format:

ASCII string like "12.73  5.42  63.03\n"
